name: Tire Game
description:
Here is a little Puzzle Game.
It's a reflexion with our Old's Warrior : Papi Commando !

You have to find the moving Tire in the stage and push it to the exit !

Beware with the time, and don't block your Tire in the stage's Corner and the others fixes Tires !! Or ... GAME OVER !!

There is no Music and sound for now.

Have fun !
